recipe.content:
apiVersion: v1
kind: List
items:
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   name: ws
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     args:
      - '--http-server-address=localhost:5555'
     command:
      - keosd
     image: 'camino.azurecr.io/eosio/eos:latest'
     imagePullPolicy: Always
     name: keosd
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 5555
       protocol: TCP
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 1024Mi
    - 
     args:
      - '-e'
      - '-p'
      - 'eosio'
      - '--plugin'
      - 'eosio::producer_plugin'
      - '--plugin'
      - 'eosio::history_plugin'
      - '--plugin'
      - 'eosio::chain_api_plugin'
      - '--plugin'
      - 'eosio::history_plugin'
      - '--plugin'
      - 'eosio::history_api_plugin'
      - '--plugin'
      - 'eosio::http_plugin'
      - '-d'
      - /projects/.eosio/data
      - '--config-dir'
      - /projects/.eosio/config
      - '--http-server-address=localhost:8888'
      - '--access-control-allow-origin=*'
      - '--contracts-console'
      - '--http-validate-host=false'
      - '--filter-on=*'
     command:
      - nodeos
     image: 'camino.azurecr.io/eosio/eos:latest'

  imagePullPolicy: Always
     name: nodeos
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 7777
       protocol: TCP
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 1024Mi

   - 
     image: 'camino.azurecr.io/eosio/cdt:latest'
     name: dev
     mem_limit: 1073741824
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 1536Mi
